content: 56 sts join being careful not to twist work in garter stitch knit one round purl one round until you have 8 garter ridges or until the brim measures approximately 3 inches work in stockinette stitch knit every round until you have approximately 3 inches of stockinette or approximately 6 inches overall begin decreases round 1 *k12 k2tog* 52 sts round 2 *k11 k2tog* 48 sts round 3 *k10 k2tog* 44 sts round 4 *k9 k2tog* 40 sts round 5 *k8 k2tog* 36 sts round 6 *k7 k2tog* 32 sts round 7 *k6 k2tog* 28 sts round 8 *k5 k2tog* 24 sts round 9 *k4 k2tog* 20 sts round 10 *k3 k2tog* 16 sts round 11 *k2 k2tog* 12 sts finishing break yarn draw tail through remaining stitches and cinch closed to help avoid a knipple that annoying pointy-ness that can occur at the top of a hat draw the tail through only once weave in ends wash hat and sew button on brim about the designer merin and her husband live in oklahoma with their cat and four ferrets she works primarily to support her yarn habit and longs for the day when she can quit her job and become a lady of leisure every once in a while she remembers she has a blog http //nekkidknitter blogspot com and posts something this pattern is provided free for non-commercial use if you find that you enjoy it enough to pay for it my creditors would greatly appreciate a donation in whatever amount you choose to dollfaceatureachdotcom but please keep the paypal fees in mind when choosing an amount anything less than a dollar and they ll see more of it than i will should you decide to make and sell items from this pattern a small royalty per unit sold would also be greatly appreciated payments are optional of course and strictly on the honor system i won t be hunting anyone down via ravelry or etsy
